result.eng: She was very active in the world of journalism in New York City.
result.ga: Bhí sí an-ghníomhach i saol na hiriseoireachta i gCathair Nua-Eabhrac
result.orig: Bhí sí an-ghníomhach i saol na hiriseoireachta i gCathair Nua-Eabhrac
result.html: Bhí sí an-ghníomhach i saol na hiriseoireachta i gCathair Nua-EabhracShe was very active in the world of journalism in New York City.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sí an-ġníoṁaċ i saol na hiriseoireaċta i gCaṫair Nua-EaḃracShe was very active in the world of journalism in New York City.

result.ga: An bhfuil deireadh le hiriseoireacht an tsaoránaigh
result.orig: An bhfuil deireadh le hiriseoireacht an tsaoránaigh
result.html: An bhfuil deireadh le hiriseoireacht an tsaoránaighIs citizen journalism finished?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil deireaḋ le hiriseoireaċt an tsaoránaiġIs citizen journalism finished?

result.eng: You didn't need an editor anymore to practise your own version of the journalistic trade.
result.ga: Ní raibh aon ghá le heagarthóir a thuilleadh le do leagan féin de cheird na hiriseoireachta a chleachtadh
result.orig: Ní raibh aon ghá le heagarthóir a thuilleadh le do leagan féin de cheird na hiriseoireachta a chleachtadh
result.html: Ní raibh aon ghá le heagarthóir a thuilleadh le do leagan féin de cheird na hiriseoireachta a chleachtadhYou didn't need an editor anymore to practise your own version of the journalistic trade.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ aon ġá le heagarṫóir a ṫuilleaḋ le do leagan féin de ċeird na hiriseoireaċta a ċleaċtaḋYou didn't need an editor anymore to practise your own version of the journalistic trade.

result.eng: Citizen journalism is a nice concept but, in the end, somebody has to pay the bills!
result.ga: Is maith an coincheap é iriseoireacht an tsaoránaigh ach i ndeireadh ama caithfear na billí a íoc
result.orig: Is maith an coincheap é iriseoireacht an tsaoránaigh ach i ndeireadh ama caithfear na billí a íoc
result.html: Is maith an coincheap é iriseoireacht an tsaoránaigh ach i ndeireadh ama caithfear na billí a íocCitizen journalism is a nice concept but, in the end, somebody has to pay the bills!
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ an coinċeap é iriseoireaċt an tsaoránaiġ aċ i ndeireaḋ ama caiṫfear na billí a íocCitizen journalism is a nice concept but, in the end, somebody has to pay the bills!
